4.2 Installing CoopSim

To install and successfully run CoopSim you need to have Python version 2.3 or above and wxPython version 2.4 or above installed on your System. You can download the installation packages from the websites mentioned above. CoopSim runs under Windows, Linux and potentially under MacOS as well, but it has only been tested under Windows and Linux. In order to install CoopSim you only need to unpack the zip archive ``CoopSim.zip'' anywhere on your hard disk.
